LanguageData.PopPopcorn_Westerado.label: pop corn kernels
LanguageData.PopPopcorn_Westerado.description:
Corn kernels that have been popped. 

Makes enough for 5 meals. 

Gives joy when eaten.
LanguageData.CookSausage_Westerado.label: make sausage
LanguageData.CookSausage_Westerado.description: Make tubes of meat from raw pork. \n\nMakes enough for 5 meals.
LanguageData.SmokeJerky_Westerado.label: smoke jerky
LanguageData.SmokeJerky_Westerado.description:
Smoke strips of jerky from raw meat. 

Makes enough for 10 meals. 

Food Effects: Metabolism.
LanguageData.CookChiliPot_Westerado.label: cook eight pots of chili
LanguageData.CookChiliPot_Westerado.description:
Slow cooks a pot of chili from a combination of raw meat, raw plant ingredients, and beer. 

Makes enough for 8 meals. 

Food Effects: Consciousness, Metabolism, Blood Filtration, and Blood Pumping.
